title: Old Plum
medium: Four sliding-door panels (fusuma); ink, color, gold, and gold leaf on paper
dimensions:
Overall (of all four panels): 68 3/4 x 191 1/8 in. (174.6 x 485.5 cm)
Overall (a): 68 3/8 x 47 5/8 in. (173.7 x 121 cm)
Overall (b): 68 3/8 x 48 3/4 in. (173.7 x 123.8 cm)
Overall (c): 68 1/2 x 47 3/4 in. (174 x 121.3 cm)
Overall (d): 68 1/2 x 47 3/4 in. (174 x 121.3 cm)
creditLine: Metropolitan Museum of Art. The Harry G. C. Packard Collection of Asian Art, Gift of Harry G. C. Packard, and Purchase, Fletcher, Rogers, Harris Brisbane Dick, and Louis V. Bell Funds, Joseph Pulitzer Bequest, and The Annenberg Fund Inc. Gift, 1975
